Bruce,
Hi my name is Debbie( from Georgia) Hi ya'll.
 
I have a question fo=
r you..... I have an old 469 model and the old 470
model.
Can you tell me w=
hat I need to ask for if I go to Radio Shack for
an external speaker for th=
e 469 ?
I don't really like listening to it with my headphones.
I am not at=
 all electronically inclined.
And I don't want to sound like an idiot when =
I go get an external
microphone
for it.....
Thanks
Deb
 

_________________=
_______________

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com] On Behalf
Of bhali333
Sent: Monday, March 24, 2008 12:07 PM
To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] For brenda, your box is on the way



=
Hi Brenda,

I shipped your 469 old model out this morning, and I included a=
n 
external speaker. It gets plugged into the headphone jack.

you are not =
far from me so you should recieve it in a couple of days. 
Let me know when=
 you get it and I'll get you up and running.

Bruce
